author: Kluma Bete
text: "Sunday for Brunch! We order a smoked salmon sandwich (with French fries) and open faced eggs with one Bloody Mary and one margarita. The food wasn't great
column5: not a lot of taste. Drinks were not good
column6: couldn't finish it. BUT great service !!"

author: Olivia
text: 'My boyfriend and I got the bao  buns
column5: the ravioli and the fish.. everything was delicious!! The ravioli was a perfect Al dente with flavorful
column6: hearty filling. The bao buns were steamed perfectly to be nice and fluffy
column7: with super tasty filling that had a nice kick to it - without being overwhelmingly spicy. We also got a few cocktails too from the seasonal list- all very tasty.'

author: john cunning
text: 'Too expensive for what u get.'

author: Nicole Ascione
text: 'Crab cake sandwich was excellent. Huge lump crab chunks'

author: Bill Schramm
text: "Very good food. Lots of things on the menu I'd like to try
column5: so we'll be back! The bar area had an old school steakhouse vibe
column6: and was a good spot to hang out. Wine selection is limited
column7: but large enough for us to find something (a couple of bottles

author: pomonadora
text: 'Had lunch with friends
column5: was delicious. Staff very friendly. Service was great. We will be back!'

author: Ashlee Carlisle
text: 'Really was excited to try this place being new to the neighborhood.  The experience was not the best.  First the waitress spill an entire alcohol drink on me and it‚Äôs not about the fact she spilled something‚Ä¶ accidents happen rather it was the way she handled it.  She did not apologize
column5: in fact she said
column6: did the drink jump from the table?‚Äù  When she directly set the drink down in between the gap of tow tables together and as soon as she let the drink go it spilled.  No acknowledgement of the inconvenience. Very gaslighty and did not apologize.  In fact took 20 minutes to bring the new drink out and then when my friend ordered his 2nd drink she brought the wrong drink twice
column7: after the second time my friend just drank it.  Manager did not come to the table and apologize.  Don‚Äôt waste your time and come here. A ton of staff

author: Adeline Gray
text: 'Everything was fine.'

author: Rob Dominiak
text: 'Good food but was not treated well by the staff. They got my order wrong for take-out
column5: and I came back to the restaurant to rectify the situation and the chef refused to do anything about it. There was no manager on sight to talk to and the host was unable to do anything. Went back home with cold meal. Terrible customer service
column6: this is no way to treat paying customers. Will not be returning.'

author: Jennifer Nisler
text: "Such a neighborhood staple! Love the mac and cheese; it's addicting! Great vibes for any occasion."

author: Chris Dunlap
text: 'Service was great. Staff was very nice and made great recommendations.'

author: Nathalye Ribeiro
text: 'I understand they cannot control the sun
column5: but they set a table outdoors quarter block away from their establishment under very little shade and did not allow us to move when I informed her my party was uncomfortable. Instead the waitress called the hostess who very condescendingly blamed us for our party being too big to accommodate - mind you we called to make reservations the day before
column6: and called to confirm the day of. Could not enjoy our food after burning for two hours. I would advise coming as a small group -6 people max (our party of eight was apparently too much for them to handle courteously)'

author: Ruth Marzano
text: 'Best brunch...'

author: Angelika Rosario
text: 'Food and drinks are so good. Got served by Garland who made the experience that much better. His temperament
column5: knowledge
column6: and professionally is unparalleled.'

author: alan herzog
text: 'Great service. Good food at a reasonable price.'

author: Ella ÿ™
text: 'Went with a group for brunch
column5: reasonably priced for how delicious the food is and how nice the seating is.\n\nI would recommend making a reservation
column6: since I didn‚Äôt and had to wait around 30 minutes.\n\nWith the Brunch menu
column7: the steak and eggs was very good and the large portion was quite filling. However
column8: the Mac and Cheese cheese was AMAZING and I could safely say it was one of the Mac and cheese dishes I‚Äôve ever had.\n\n5 stars

author: Jim Twetten
text: 'Our first time here. The lamb Bolognese and stuffed chicken were very good.'

author: George
text: 'Got the brisket burger and some Kane head high on tap. Super good would go again. Varied menu and prompt service (went during the week). Would recommend to anyone!'

author: Regina Jaslow
text: 'Great meal and lots of outdoor seating!'

author: Johnny O
text: 'Beautiful bar. The Guinness is poured properly and the food is well portioned.'

author: Des KF
text: "So I met a friend of mine for brunch here. I made my reservations online for 12:30pm. When I arrived I parked on the street fairly quickly. I walked up and the hostess greeted us and sat us. She sat us in the corner inside and said there is a 90 minute limit for tables. Mackie was our server and she was nice. For my drink I ordered a spiked coffee drink and my friend ordered a mimosa. The drink wasn't bad
column5: didn't taste any liquor at all. For my entr√©e I ordered the chicken and waffles and my friend ordered the salmon salad special. My meal wasn't bad at all
column6: I liked the waffles more than the chicken. My friend said her salad was good
column7: she just wished there was more dressing. The bill for me came to about $31. We had a pretty decent time all in all."

author: Keonte Williams
text: 'Great food and drinks'

author: Caprice Clark
text: 'Our waitress was wonderful and our food was splendid. I recommend getting the mussels and the shrimp orzo!'

author: Tammy H
text: 'I took my pup put with me for Brunch at Zacks and the staff was super wonderful to me and my pup! Brunch was Great!'

author: Jacqueline Aguilar
text: 'The food and ambiance is always great. Service was a little slow for Sunday brunch. However the food made up for it!  We had the farmer‚Äôs breakfast and the eggs Benedict- super tasty. The home fries had a nice surprise to them.. they were mixed in with sweet potatoes!! ( not my partners favorite) But I thought they were so delicious! The mimosas were alright.'

author: Erik Kloepping
text: 'The food here is excellent. The service is excellent. Everything about this place is well...excellent!'

author: Sanjeev Regmi
text: 'Great little place. Wonderful food. Nice ambience. May be tad small tables for a proper dinner.'

author: High Tech
text: "Zack's is fantastic to say the least
column5: the menu is just great. I was amazed at the variety and more complex dishes. Wine
column6: scotch
column7: and drink options were great. Service was wonderful
column8: great location for outdoor eating. Inside bar has a really nice vibe. I also appreciate the very clean and nicely put bathroom
column9: I don't think I saw a sign though. But anyways the restaurant is easily one of my favorite in hoboken
column10: I super appreciate the effort they put in to make it a great experience. Ooo yea and all the staff were super friendly. Thanks!"

author: Hanna Baldwin
text: "Food was okay
column5: service okay
column6: what's unbelievable is that I was charged an extra fee simply because I asked for bread that was SUPPOSED to come with the bowl of mussels with tomatoe  sauce.  It's not about the fee but rather about the CONCEPT!\nWon't be coming back."

author: Swapnila Mundra
text: 'Food was okay place was okay'

author: Michelle Harvey Curtis
text: 'Came across this restaurant trying to find somewhere to eat outside of New York and the food was really good
column5: the staff amazing.  The 1 young lady working was running both the bar and the floor and had it all under control. Shrimp Cesar salad delicious
column6: the chicken sandwich and empanadas

author: Jaye Bame
text: 'The food is amazing here and the service staff are pretty awesome. I strongly recommend giving this place a try and bring the family with ya.'

author: Greg Merritt
text: '4 star food
column5:
maybe even 5 star.

But a 2 star experience. It is set up like a sports bar (nobody watching lmao). The music is somewhere between bad pop and awful - total vibe killer.

It looks like it could be a higher end historical steak house. But the experience
column6: was a dud.'

author: Margaret Banks
text:
'One bad Appel ruined the meal!!!

I decided to celebrate Father‚Äôs Day at a local restaurant( zack‚Äôs in Hoboken our server was amazing!!!
However one of the staff servers was shockingly rude.she acted as if she was disturbed by our very presence at the restaurant . When we asked for out take out containers she questioned us as if we were asking for something unreasonable. Then She put her hand in our containers to count them as to make sure we were not trying to take extra !!!! and then walked back with another container slammed it on the table and walked away. First  we are coming out of a global health crisis ..second we just spent over $150 on a meal that was below average. I have no intention of returning to zacks as a black woman with my family it‚Äôs not a place that I‚Äôd recommend to any of my friends and the sad part is I think that‚Äôs the way the establishment would prefer it.'

author: Ian Usher
text: 'Favorite brunch in Hoboken!'

author: Cheryl Strodder
text: 'We hosted out of town family here for dinner Friday June 11
column5: 2021. We seat out side we were a group of 13. We had a very pleasant experience. The food was good. Service was timely. The wait staff was pleasant
column6: attentive and accommodating.'

author: Jonathan Pepe
text: "I've been eating at Zacks for over a decade and it's still my go to for a cozy dinner when I don't want to cook. The stuffed chicken is an institution. Good drinks
column5: outdoor seating
column6: friendly (albeit now very junior) staff. The inside is warm and cozy
column7: great for dates. Outside is a classic Hoboken streetery experience."

author: Nicole Jala
text: 'Delicious food and drinks
column5: as always!'

author: Daniel Calvo
text: 'Service was a little disorganized but food was great.'

author: Christopher Lydon
text: 'Just had brunch there and it was good. Bloody Mary‚Äôs are nice and large with a lemon and lime slice and one olive by default. Irish coffee comes with Baileys and whipped cream by default so let them know if you want something different'

author: Pao Bonilla
text: 'The brunch food was great. The service was fast
column5: efficient
column6: and friendly. The place is small but really nice. I‚Äôm planning on coming back.'

author: Gina Rivezzi
text: 'The atmosphere was ok
column5: not too decorative but the food was great. We ordered the nachos
column6: penne vodka and grilled cheese - all were amazing. We got some drinks and dessert and those were good as well. Definitely worth it and will be back. The prices werent bad at all for the amount of food you get.'

author: Mark Errico
text: "Great food and service!   I'll be back!"

author: Sahil Bassi
text: "Best Truffle fries in town!! Zack's has a nice cozy vibes which perfect for a date night. Humble staff and delicious food. Must try asparagus stuffed chicken and brisket burger."

author: Hanna Silva
text: 'service is great. food is meh'

author: Allison Eberle (Allie E)
text: 'Amazing staff
column5: short wait time
column6: the food was all great. Fantastic midscale place for interesting and tasty eats. I will be going back.'

author: Emily Ng
text: 'Pretty restaraunt and good food
column5: just make sure you know that different fries or toppings are extra $. Overall
column6: 8/10 and nice waiter'

author: Arthur Wickline
text: 'Great Food! Very comfortable spot!\nSteak Sandwich is delicious!'

author: Stanley Marcellus Simons
text: 'Great environment and great food. The presentation could have been better on the Short rib ravioli but it still tasted great.'

author: matthew dogali
text: 'Fun place to hang.'

author: Pete
text: "Pretty good
column5: great service
column6: food wasn't bad"

author: Jason Winkler
text: 'Very good
column5: but also more expensive than it needed to be'

author: Vincent Cangemi
text: 'Great food
column5: and excellent service!'

author: Pranit Kulkarni
text: 'Good food and ambience. However be careful if they charge correctly on your card. I was later charged more than what I signed for.'

author: Muneeb Khawaja
text: 'The servers were in a rush to have us order food and leave. They were nice
column5: but kind of wanted us gone'

author: John Vargas
text: 'Excellent food as always.'

author: Najla Jones
text: 'Very welcoming and accommodating üëçüèΩ.'

author: Jess the Blessed
text: 'Went to brunch with my friends who had not seen in over a year due to the ‚Äòrona. Staff was very friendly and polite. The food was pretty good. At one point one of my friends received the wrong order but they were quick and kind about the mix up. We dined inside too
column5: which we are aware of the risks but the staff ensured to keep the place as safe as possible by taking your temperature upon entering. We had a Saturday 1:30 pm reservation and didn‚Äôt have to wait!'

author: Jessica Nisler
text: 'Awesome restaurant! The brisket burger is a must try!  Their outdoor set up is like no one else in Hoboken (heaters and all!)'

author: Rad C
text: "Beware my vegetarian friends
column5: this restaurant needs a tutorial on how to cook vegetables. Ordered the Kung pao cauliflower which tasted stale
column6: the portobello in the portobello burger was uncooked. They charred a portion of my nachos
column7: which I ordered without beef of course
column8: and when I pointed it out
column9: they just took the charred portion away. So I took the meat out
column10: they took a portion of the nachos out
column11: but I still paid the same price. I don't I will be going back anytime soon."

author: Dev Chatterjee
text: 'The food was great. Very busy on a Saturday night and a tad bit of mismanagement. Although once taken care of the quality was amazing.\nI‚Äôd bump it up to 4.5 if I could.'

author: john stevens
text: 'Great spot for brunch! Food came out surprisingly quick
column5: yet with no lack of quality.'

author: Saloni Jiwan
text: 'Good brunch place. 1 hour 30 mins time cap on in door dining.'

author: Nitish D
text: 'Setting is warm and inviting. Food is well cooked
column5: especially burgers. Service is great
column6: the person who took care of my table did an outstanding job
column7: really made us feel at home. Will return & recommend.'

author: kareem ibrahim
text: 'I loved the food and the workers were all nice to me.'

author: Joseph Szarmach
text: "Don't waste your time looking for a breakfast place on the strip. Totally worth the short drive. Incredible!"

author: Frank Scarola
text: "Great atmosphere
column5: very friendly and attentive staff and good food. Covid-19 protocols in place and outdoor seating with heaters available. Zack's is an all around a good establishment and good experience."

author: Anuja Puranik
text: "Came here for a date night and food and ambience blew me away. They currently have tikki bar going on with tikki cocktails. Food is lovely
column5: drinks are great and totally loved the hot chocolate brownie in the end. Stuffed chicken is a very good dish and an Italian starter with fries are good in appetizers.  They don't have food vegetarian entree options.\n\n** If you book the table - You can only sit 60 minutes indoor on the table. Please do reservation as it gets pretty crowded especially on weekends."

author: Teresita Coello
text: '(Translated by Google) I was fascinated
column5: very moved
column6: attentive concerned. Excellent treatment
column7:
good presentation of the dish and exquisite flavorüí•

(Original)
Me fascin√≥
column10: buena presentaci√≥n del plato y exquisito saborüí•'

author: Ryan Devlin
text: 'Great service and very good food.'

author: Kary Haro
text: 'Average menu. Well executed items. Good service. Clean bathrooms.'

author: Brookanna Griffith-Harford
text: 'Came here for my anniversary and had a beautiful candlelit dinner! Food is quite savory  and came surprisingly fast... our waitress was super friendly & catered well to our needs! Loved that the waterfront is not too far from the restaurant!'

author: umar zaman
text: 'Great place delicious food and customer service is awesome.'

author: Clark Eastham
text: "Can't wait to go back!!"

author: Samara Lugo
text: 'Really really good food. Very professional\nand friendly staff. I highly recommend it and the price is right for the value you get. Had a lovely brunch here today with some girlfriends. ~50 per person with two carefully crafted cocktails each.'

author: Daniel Rodriguez
text: 'Great tasting food
column5: great customer services'

author: Jason Rapaccuiolo
text: 'Service was great.  Restaraunt was really nice.'

author: Maria Morgan-Trevino
text: 'The food is good
column5: great drinks'

author: Mark Pasculli
text: 'Had a great experience at Zack‚Äôs. The food was exceptional and the staff were friendly.'

author: Nicole Rodriguez
text: 'Great food
column5: great service
column6: and great ambiance! Definitely would recommend :)'

author: Sophia T
text: 'They have an amazing chicken sandwich (Monroe)
column5: salad
column6: and a steak sandwich (Willow). However
column7: their calamari and French onion soup taste storebought and microwaved and I do not recommend their penne vodka.'

author: Noshin Nisa
text: "A nice place for brunch. The area has a lot of options around. It was difficult to find a place to sit and a very long wait time. We were told it would take another 30 mins after waiting for 30 mins already because there are many people waiting before us. But as soon as we left they texted table is ready so it seems like they were not in sync about how many people are waiting and so on. The seats were too close to the street and it was a little annoying to be so close to people just walking by as you are not wearing a mask while eating. The food was decent but I am not so sure if it's worth the wait and the risk."

author: Mario Jorell Haigler
text: 'Great vintage look. Great staff and awesome flavors'

author: James Foley
text: 'This place is great
column5: a local favorite!'

author: Laura Karmin
text: 'Very polite staff. Nice atmosphere. Great food'

author: H.C. Laughlin
text: 'This place is amazing.\nService was very nice and fast.\nFood was delicious! My kid ordered the Mac and cheese
column5: which was made with the larger shells and filled with great taste.\nThe husband had some egg Benedict plate
column6: which looked delicious - he finished it before I could try.\nThe brunch spritzer was delicious. Tasted very light and sweet - no bitterness.'

author: Victoria Bellero
text: 'Always an amazing experience here. The staff is fantastic and the food/drinks are amazing! My favorite local spot'

author: Sidney Suggs
text: 'Never been to a restaurant where the Waitress was too busy flirting with customers rather than attending to customers tables. The chicken sandwich which they claim to be known for is simply  a chik fil a sandwich. Fries tasted frozen and the calamari tasted chewy and rubbery. The tap water was very chlorinated.(ever heard of filters?) Would expect better from a well known ‚Äútop‚Äù restaurant in Hoboken.'

author: Sameh Roufail
text: 'Nice place. Friendly employees.  Good food. Suitable price'

author: anna david
text: 'The ambience despite the COVID outside seating is still amazing. The staff was also really nice and polite. However the food did not meet the standards at all. We ordered mussels for appetizers
column5: the sauce tasted good in itself but the mussels and sauce did not go well at all. We also ordered spare ribs and brisket burger for entrees. The spare ribs were so horribly over cooked it felt like it was pressure cooked and came in a bland and no taste sauce. It left a bad feeling after eating with the over cooked pork fat. The only good thing in the dish was mashed potatoes. The burger buns were very dry
column6: but marginally better than the ribs. The French fries that came with the burger was alright.'

author: Wyatt Cornell
text: 'The service was very quick and all the food was fantastic. I now have a go-to place in Hoboken!'

author: Darrell Goodman
text: 'Great service
column5: food was very good.'

author: Kevin Arms
text: 'Whenever we visit Hoboken we always try to plan a brunch here!  Excellent food and service
column5: with a side of friendly attitudes all around.'

author: Todd Lindquist
text: 'Always a great local restaurant
column5: friendly staff
column6: god food and drink selections'

author: Ludovic MASSON
text: 'Very good place - i recommend it ! easy access and great location\nTook the Fish Tacos and Kale Salad with Steak: it was very good ! Good service as well.\nI put only 4 stars as we were disappointed by the Burrata (basically half of a burrata you can buy at the supermarket) and the Hoboken Sunrise cocktail (very light on Alcohol).'

author: Brandon Felice
text: 'Brisket. Blend. Burger. All. Day.'

author: Andrew Da
text: "Amazing burgers and nachos here
column5: not to forget the beer specials as well. Overall
column6: great experience here with my best crew. Can get a bit loud and crowded but that's how it is around here. Cant wait to go back here!"

author: Carolyn Norman
text: 'Best burger in Hobken!!! Yummmm'

author: Julian Benitez
text: 'It is not well lit. Very loud. My lovely girlfriend have the beef ravioli. It was pretty terrible with a side of awful. I had the Tata something it was good. It had a tasty lemon sauce but after 2 bites it became flavorless. They had really good bread. I will never go back.'

author: Emily Wong
text: "Really great happy hour and delicious food. Definitely a good option for a quick bite. Their Kung Pao cauliflower is to die for and don't forget the cheesecake! Has a great beer selection as well."

author: Kenneth Lange
text: "Super nice staff and family friendly. Food was good too. Great neighborhood place like you'd want to see everywhere."

author: Melissa B
text: 'I honestly enjoy the food and customer service
column5: awesome location close to my residence. The staff is always welcoming. Highly recommended.'

author: Philip Mierswa
text: 'Chicken sandwich lived up to the hype
column5: great cocktails
column6: will definitely be back'

author: Binny Patel
text: "This spot is awesome but really it's impossible to get a seat. Could use more space and wish it was stroller friendly"

author: Maria Santiago
text: 'Awesome place to eat
column5: bartenders are awesome preparing all kinds of drinks with an effusion of flavors. Food is amazing great flavors and tastes. A cozy place to enjoy food and drinks. I recommend you to go and wat there. management is awesome!!!'

author: Marcos Rodriguez Martinez
text: 'Great place to eat and drink. Brunch are amazing and the bartenders creat the most amazing drinks!!!'

author: ron calabria
text: 'Great place great food reasonably priced great service'

author: Robert Pellecchia
text: 'Great drafts on tap. The atmosphere is lively with a great bar. I always get the Willow with cheddar and it‚Äôs cooked to perfection.'

author: Marc Celli
text: 'Decent Pub food'

author: Ryan
text: 'Really calm when we went. Service was good and so was the food'

author: Mordechai Gabay
text: 'Great place to have some drinks and maybe an appetizer or two.'

author: mrocknrol
text: 'Good food and atmosphere'
